channel.title: Dave
channel.description: On the net since mid-70s. Started two Silicon Valley companies. Wrote for Wired. Fellow at Harvard, NYU. Founder of podcasting, blogging, RSS. Open web.

item.description: President Trump has surrendered to the coronavirus. (I've had the same thought, but surrendering here means the war continues until we're all infected. There's no peace possible. The virus won't offer us terms.)
